text:
The [[Riedra]]n navy transports
soldiers and patrols the coasts in search of smugglers and
would-be infiltrators. It escorts each visitor to [[Dar Jin]] through the [[Harbor of Tranquility]] to customs inspection, and thus is the first branch of the [[Harmonious Shield]] most visitors see. They also maintain coastal forts such as [[Kintam Rhlash]].
title: Harmonious Sail
